pages.text: It is possible to obtain containers from the Twilight grove, the home of ghosts and spirits which have a variety of valuables within: the Reliquary and the Spirit Bag.$(br2)The simplest way to achieve this is with the $(modifier:gifts_of_undeath)$() modifier for the $(l:spells/spell_harvest)Harvest$() spell.$(br2)$(info) There may be other sources of these beyond those available by default.
You can see a listing of all of the items that can be obtained from $(uses:roots:reliquary)Reliquaries$() and $(uses:roots:spirit_bag)Spirit Bags$() with JEI.
